ygData.subject: Re: Begging taunt
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, it does work I do this all the time you need to bind a key that looks like this: /attack off /beg /attack on  Hope that helps...also as an SK you shouldnt
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, it does work I do this all the time you need to bind a key that
looks like this: /attack off /beg /attack on Hope that helps...also
as an SK you shouldnt have any problems outtaunting any one...use
lvl 9 disease and shadow vortex plus taunt and bash...never use a
2hs if you want agro only if you are not main tank.


--- In eq_shadowknights@y..., "Xillith ofNeriak" <Xillith@h...>
wrote:
>
> You cannot beg with auto attack enabled. So, you must stop
attacking, hit
> beg key, and renew the attack. I havnt had a success yet but my
begging
> skill is like...1 That skill MUST be there for some reason other
than
> making city guards kill you!
>
> Xillith
